Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by Milwaukee in 2010...
Had first career hit on 5/15/2010, off Daisuke Matsuzaka (PIT)...
Earned first career win on 6/13/2010...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/2013, going 5-0, 1.03...
Injured on 10/4/2013 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2017, going 5-1, 1.69...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/2018, going 4-0, 1.12...
Injured on 6/5/2018 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/2019, off Roberto Ramires (HOU)...
Injured on 8/27/2019 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/18/2020, winning one game with a 2.84 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2021, going 2-0, 0.50...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Injured on 6/25/2023 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2023, going 3-0, 0.57...
